content: ♥♥♥ from march 5th to may 2nd 2022 all income from this pattern was donated to **ukraine** via unhcr sweden 1 which is the swedish section of unhcr 2 the un refugee agency this pattern is now for free and i hope these little mice will continue to spread love ♥♥♥ the rainbow mouse pattern is crocheted in a spiral from the tail to the nose in one sweep ears included you only need to sew/embroider the eyes and nose these little critters are perfect little gifts and also a good way to use upp small amounts of yarn **pattern features ** * written pattern pdf pattern * photos to show the neccesary steps of the pattern * full stitch count **yarn ** i recommend fingering 100% cotton yarn for this pattern approx 4 gram color changing yarn for the body and 2-3 gram solid colored yarn for the head **hook ** 2 5 mm or the size that suits your yarn **stitches used in this pattern us terms ** chain slip_stitch single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet and treble **join my facebook group ** my facebook group mijo crochet hangout 3 is a place where you can get support ask questions share pictures and socialize with other fellow crocheters ❀❀❀ thank you heike berg for testing this pattern ❀❀❀ copyright mijo crochet 2022 this pattern is for personal use only reproduction and publication of pictures and/or pattern is not allowed 1 https //sverigeforunhcr se/ 2 https //www unhcr org/who-we-help html 3 https //www facebook com/groups/mijocrochethangout
